item.title: Man charged over alleged role in fatal shooting of underworld figure Dawood Zakaria in Sydney's west

item.title: Two workers win tens of thousands in wage case against Melbourne cafe
item.description: <p>Former workers of a popular cafe in a famously affluent suburb say they are yet to see tens of thousands of dollars they are owed, despite winning a court battle against the owner months ago.</p>

item.title: Driver who deliberately swerved to kill two kangaroos on NSW road spared jail
item.description: <p>A man who deliberately swerved to kill two kangaroos with his ute after drinking with his mates has been spared a stint in prison.</p>

item.title: 'Serious societal problem': 'Busy criminals' will move on after Qantas cyber attack
